en-US.summary: Control Lionel TMCC and Legacy Engines, Trains, and Equipment
en-US.name: pytrain
en-US.description:
PyTrain allows you to control your Lionel TMCC/Legacy layout using your voice. You can throw switches, fire routes, and control engines and trains all with voice commands. Examples of engine and train operations include:

* Start up Train 53
* Accelerate Train 53 to speed step 35
* Reverse Train 5
* Ring the bell on Engine 10
* Stop Train 35
* Set the smoke level on engine 6 to low
 * Emergency Halt

PyTrain requires you to run a local HTTPS server that proxies requests to an running instance of the PyTrain API.
en-US.updatesDescription: Added support for accessing PyTrain API via HTTP or HTTPS
